text: They are proud parents to a one - year - old daughter named Alana Martina. And Cristiano Ronaldo's fiancée Georgina Rodriguez was spotted enjoying a walk with the tiny tot and the sports star's twins Eva and Mateo in Turin on Monday. The 24 - year - old beauty showered the baby with kisses and affection, looking every inch the doting mother. Devoted mother : Cristiano Ronaldo's fiancée Georgina Rodriguez was spotted enjoying a walk with her daughter Alana Martina and the sports star's twins Eva and Mateo during a visit to Turin on Monday Georgina was bundled up against the cold in a padded jacket and leggings as she joined the couple's nanny on her walk. Also accompanying them were several burly security guards, who helped the ladies load
